alert.note: Alert for Bee; Coastal Calhoun; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Live Oak; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 05 at 7:42AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN... VICTORIA...GOLIAD...NORTHERN REFUGIO...CENTRAL LIVE OAK AND BEE COUNTIES THROUGH 845 AM CDT... At 742 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Speaks to 6 miles northwest of Mission Valley to near Karnes City. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Beeville, Goliad, McFaddin, Guadalupe, Fannin, Quintana, Victoria Colony Creek Country Club, Weesatche, River Creek Acres, Weser, Nursery, Victoria Riverside Park, Victoria College, Victoria Mall, Saxet Lakes, Green Lake, Brentwood Subdivision, Karon, and Inez. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 51 and 64. US Highway 181 between mile markers 572 and 600. US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 666. US Highway 59 between mile markers 624 and 718. US Highway 77 between mile markers 560 and 618. US Highway 87 between mile markers 798 and 836. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Coastal Calhoun; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Live Oak; Victoria
